question: What is the central healthcare facility located in the southern part of Trakai, Lithuania?
true_answer: Trakai District Central Hospital and Polyclinic.
asked_question_translated: Qual é a unidade central de saúde situada na parte sul de Trakai, na Lituânia?
answer: A unidade central de saúde situada na parte sul de Trakai, na Lituânia, é o Trakai Primary Healthcare Centre.
answer_translated_eng: The central healthcare facility in the southern part of Trakai, Lithuania, is the Trakai Primary Healthcare Centre.
